column4: i'm doing backup from my ubuntu drive to my windows drive using correctly configured samba and backintime-gnome.  its somewhat slow, and definitely a resource hog.  can't listen to music while its transferring.  i could invest on online storage solutions does anyone know how much amazon cloud services would cost for 600GB of data to back, and say, differrential updates twice a week ?
actually scooter you can get release candidates for 10.1 now
i`d use an external hd and rsync. personally.
sounds like its down to your io scheduler.  try deadline
